snippet.title: Shotgun Mario 64 - RELEASE & DOWNLOAD! | SM64 ROM Hack
snippet.description:
Blast your way through good ol' Mario 64 with a SHOTGUN!  A completely new shotgun mechanic complete with firing, a jump-boost, an aiming mode with a crosshair, and many unique interactions to make for a fresh SM64 experience.  This game took around 200 hours of work to make
* ParaLLEl with its native plug-in is the way to play this game.  This also supports dual analog for aiming mode when using ParaLLEl.
* This runs on N64 hardware, though you'll likely run into some crashes, since I'm still testing on N64 and working on stability.  For the best stability, framerate and graphical effects, play on ParaLLEl

*** DOWNLOAD: https://romhacking.com/hack/shotgun-mario-64 ***

Like what I make? The best way to help out is if you want to spread the word and tell your friends about my mods!
Previews of my MIPS the rabbit game: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRzRbTL5z06lnVhuY1FtfsS75R6c_46_M
My major hack demo: https://youtu.be/XfAkOiU9s7w
My engine optimization: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRzRbTL5z06mot9aV6FU8ba9kkUPTQOax
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/dan_gptv

SM64 ROM hack releases from both me and my bro Alex: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRzRbTL5z06lfgDRGWecznGPARS7t2RFi
I stream my game development LIVE on Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/gomeplaytv

Subscribe to catch all releases and previews of every new adventure!
--
